PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.label: Monster
PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.description: Pokémon in this group are saurian/kaiju-like in appearance and nature.

PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.label: Water 1
PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.description: Pokémon in this group are amphibious in nature.

PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.label: Bug
PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.description: Pokémon in this group are insectoid (bug-like) in appearance.

PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.label: Flying
PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.description: Pokémon in this group are avian (birdlike) in appearance.

PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.label: Field
PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.description: Pokémon in this group are terrestrial in nature.

PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.label: Fairy
PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.description: Pokémon in this group are petite and considered very cute.

PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.label: Grass
PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.description: Pokémon in this group are plantlike in appearance.

PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.label: Human-Like
PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.description: Pokémon in this group are fully bipedal.

PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.label: Water 3
PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.description: Pokémon in this group resemble aquatic invertebrates.

PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.label: Mineral
PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.description: Pokémon in this group are inorganic in nature.

PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.label: Amorphous
PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.description: Pokémon in this group are amorphous, having no definite form.

PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.label: Water 2
PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.description: Pokémon in this group are piscine (fishlike) in appearance.

PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.label: Ditto
PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.description: Ditto is the only Pokémon in this group, and is capable of breeding with all others Pokémon (regardless of gender) aside from those in the Undiscovered and the Ditto group.

PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.label: Dragon
PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.description: Pokémon in this group are draconic in appearance.

PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.label: Undiscovered
PokeWorld.eggGroupDef.description: Pokémon in this group are unable to breed.
